About the Company: Bliss GVS Pharma Ltd.is engaged in the manufacture of a wide range of Pessary Formulations, Suppository Formulations, Calcium Preparation, Protein Powders, Iron Preparation, Antibiotics, Analgesic & Antipyretics, Respiratory, Anti-inflammatory, Dermatological Preparations, Anti-Diarrhoeal products.The companys most unique product is Today Vaginal Contraceptive, a safe female contraceptive .The Prescription drugs of the company include Alaxin, Gvither, P-Alaxin, Gsunate and Lonart ,Rectol, Poroxicam, Parafen, Vomitin, Slipizem, AnomexProchloperazine, Imazole, Gvgyl, Terconazole, Vagid, Gvgyl - N, etc. and over the counter products are Today Regular, Today Economy, Today Premium.Maitri Vaginal Lubricant Pessary,etc.
